pull.title: depends: zeromq 4.3.5
pull.body:
First new point release of zeromq in two and a half years. Mostly bug fixes; the project also completed a relicense to the "Mozilla Public License".

See https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/releases/tag/v4.3.5.

events.body: ACK 986d7fed057b995a720787cbbd21e1c41763fb83, I have reviewed the code and it looks OK.

ACK 986d7fed057b995a720787cbbd21e1c41763fb83

Independently verified the sha256sum.
Also checked that the now removed patch is indeed in the [upstream](https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/commit/6473bf4166215db1f042e10bd1bd9708f8a66347).
